column1: Sindanórie is a said to be the name of a "mythical region of shadows"
column2: situated at the outer feet of the Pelóri Mountains in Valinor.
Galadriel said that out of a Grey Country (sindanóriello) darkness lay on the waves that separated herself and Varda.

column1: The Quenya name Sindanórie consists of Sindar#Etymology ("grey") and nóre ("land").
